subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The long shot Poseidon’s Warrior held off Justin Phillip by a neck in deep stretch to score an upset in the Grade I Vanderbilt Handicap at Saratoga Race Course.
snippet: The long shot Poseidon’s Warrior held off Justin Phillip by a neck in deep stretch to score an upset in the Grade I Vanderbilt Handicap at Saratoga Race Course.
